mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_NO, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, ROOM_BOARD_PARENT_BOARD_NO, ROOM_BOARD_PARENT_REPLY_NO, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_DEPTH, MEMBER_ID, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_CREATE_DT, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_MODIFY_DT, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_STATUS FROM ROOM_BOARD_REPLY JOIN MEMBER ON(ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND ROOM_BOARD_PARENT_BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY ROOM_BOARD_PARENT_REPLY_NO DESC, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_BOARD_REPLY(ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_NO, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, ROOM_BOARD_PARENT_BOARD_NO, ROOM_BOARD_PARENT_REPLY_NO, ROOM_BOARD_REPLY_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_RBRNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{parentBoardNo}, SEQ_RBRNO.CURRVAL , #{memberId})
